page.title: 15Tourism 1
page.content:
{ Scalby Mills}amusement area contains a poolroom, children's rides, slide and pool, machine arcade, cafeteria and souvenir shop.
{ Peasholm Park}and{the Glen}cover over 27 acres. The boating lake of 4 acres has canoes and rowing-boats for hire, model naval battles, motor-boat trips, water ski-ing displays and Sunday band concerts. The central island has an illuminated "Tree Walk". The park also contains a miniature golf course, putting green, aviary, wishing well and children's boat pool.
{ Scarborough}Council also owns a miniature railway which runs between {Northstead Manor}gardens and{Scalby {Mills}during the summer. Two quarter scale Pacific locos pull passenger loads of 100 each.
